title: Looking for Trouble
description: She’s:UptightShelteredAllergic to funHe’s:CockyCrudeUnapologeticHe’s all dirty jokes and curse words, while she’s quiet and shy. She blends into the background, while he is the center of everyone’s attention.Clay Mitchell never expected to fall in love. Especially not with a girl he’s known all his life and one who’s always been off-limits.Opposites might attract, but in this case of explosive chemistry, someone's heart is bound to be shattered.As enemies become friends and friends morph into more; Clay has definitely met his match.
author: Stacey Lewis
